function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Win-lose relationship between health and the economy due to social confinement","Impact":"Potential adverse effects on both health and economy","Mitigation":"Implement measures to balance health and economic considerations during confinement","Technologies":"Health monitoring technologies, remote work solutions","People":"Individuals, policymakers, business owners","Owner":"Policymakers, business owners"},{"Description":"Correlation between environmental impacts and economic activity","Impact":"Risk of environmental pollution and adverse effects on health","Mitigation":"Develop sustainable solutions to decouple environmental impacts from economic activity","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, waste management solutions","People":"Environmental experts, policymakers","Owner":"Environmental experts, policymakers"},{"Description":"COVID-19 risk control measures and environmental impacts","Impact":"Temporary positive and adverse environmental effects","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce adverse effects and enhance positive environmental impacts","Technologies":"Wastewater treatment technologies, sustainable waste disposal methods","People":"Health authorities, environmental agencies","Owner":"Health authorities, government"}]}
